content.text:
The arrow in this figure <image 1> is pointing to which part of the brain?

A. parietal lobe
B. temporal lobes
C. cerebral cortex
D. occipital lobe

The arrow in the figure is pointing to the pink-colored section of the brain, which is located at the front and slightly below the blue section. This area corresponds to the temporal lobes of the brain.

So, the correct answer is:

B. temporal lobes
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
